No matter how much you 
catch me, I won't fall down

oh like the small

comments.author: Heleina Kwon

comments.text:
Why complain? So what if it's not Exo's D.O? If you don't like the fact 
that it's not him, then simply just leave! I don't get why you think you 
simply have to state it out there to the world that you're mad because you 
didn't get what you wanted. It's not their fault, either, so there's 
nothing that can be fixed. Especially since it's been well over a year. For 
the Mygirls that are oh so bothered by it that they have to HATE Exo-Ls for 
the ordeal, GET OVER IT. They simply didn't know and obviously wanted to 
know if it actually was Exo's D.O or not. Of course, there were some who 
were unnecessarily being rude about it, but just ignore them. If you're 
while intention wS just to enjoy the beauty that is MYNAME, then there's no 
need to get so hung over about a few whiny people. There's no need to whine 
back. Just ignore it. It doesn't have to be so difficult. ﻿

comments.author: Kritsanaphong Phoomee

comments.text:
Fellow EXO-L here; I just want to say something. 
It's OKAY to click and listen to a song because you see your favourite 
artist is featuring. That's why well-known artists are asked to/choose to 
feature: to make their fans interested in listening to the other artist's 
song and give it a chance.
But it is NOT okay to bring down the song or the artists involved-- saying 
that "it sucks", that they should "get out" and even complaining. Freedom 
of speech, I get that. But that's just being rude to the group (MYNAME), 
the person featuring (Deux's Lee Hyun Do), and the fans of both fandoms. 
Nobody likes that. People who do that aren't benefitting anything and are 
just being a nuisance to everyone.
Nobody likes fan wars, either. How to prevent them? Just click dislike 
(there's always gonna be more likes, anyways) and go on your way and click 
on a video you might actually like.﻿
comments.author: taehy-ng

comments.text:
I'm not going to lie, I'm an EXO-L and came because I thought it was EXO's 
D.O, but I don't get why so many people are hating on this song just 
because it's not the D.O that we were expecting. After listening to this, I 
became new MyGirl, and this song is amazing, so why hate on it? It's not 
their fault EXO's D.O isn't here. And still some other people are 
complaining that people are only coming because they all thought it was D.O 
from EXO. Don't complain, because they're actually helping to raise the 
views, and that's beneficial because maybe more fans will be recruited, 
like me. But there's just one more thing; as a new MyGirl, do you guys know 
what TV Shows I can watch to know them better? And who is that cutie at 1:15
?﻿

MVs since they're a bit more somber). This is a great song for their 
vocals. The camera work is really nice too (it gave me Hey!Say!JUMP 
nostalgia haha). SO good to not be disappointed by these wildly talented 
boys.﻿
comments.author: Samantha Bonilla
